captions.text:
Hi Bob Mathews with Power 1 K Body Shaping
Program. I want to show you how to get big

forearms. Forearms are cool because most shirts
come down to here and if you've got a nice

forearm it looks good. I get comments all
the time. People say what do you do for forearms?

Well I do one thing now. Before we show you
the exercise I always practice every single

day either at our location or on line. It
is going to take time. You are going to have

to be patient but you know what if you do
this probably four days a week more than other

body parts you use your forearms for everything,
for writing, for eating, for driving, for

opening things, closing things. So it's a
muscle that is very very resistant and that's

why you don't see a lot of nicely shaped forms
so in this exercise all you are going to do

is take some dumbbells and you are going to
go back and forth and now I like 25 of these

followed by 25 twisters. Now this to show
you guys is just 20 pounds and I say that

because as you get stronger and stronger you
are going to have to go up and you can actually

go quite heavy in these up into the 50's and
60's in each hand actually. But what you'll

know when you've done it right because when
you finish 25, 25 of these, right now, about

now in a real scenario you would be feeling
like they're going to fall out of your hand

and you're going to feel like you are not
going to make it and your arms will be just

turning so numb. So when you are finished
with the 25th you can't wait to let go and

when you let go you'll feel it pulsating.
Now if you don't feel anything you just sit

it down and walk off to the water fountain.
Well then you're probably making a huge mistake

and you are wasting your time. I'm not trying
to say go so heavy you can't finish the exercise

but you should be very very challenged and
if you're not, you're not going to get anything

in your forearms, you're just going to be
spending time at the gym. Alright so good

luck and see some big forearms soon. Good
luck.

title: Toning & Building Muscle : How to Get Big Forearms

comments.text:
This nutritional software has a database of almost 1400 different foods 
that you can select from to help you meet the nutritional requirement of

comments.author: Albert Watson

comments.text:
+Albert Watson Don't assume that because something worked for someone else, 
it will for you. There are so many factors involved in your growth and 
genetic makeup is a huge one. 1 - 1.5 grams per lb is a very general 
guideline. Some people might need less and some people might need more bro.
comments.author: Walter Martinez

comments.text:
+Albert Watson Your body style defines what type of exercise and 
nutritional practices will give you the greatest results in your struggles 
to construct lean muscle mass and lose fat. The Somanabolic Muscle 
Maximizer will tell you precisely what your body requires to build enduring 
muscle as rapidly as possible. You will not have to estimate how much to 
eat or how much 
weight lifting and exercise you must to do to build muscles since the 
Somanabolic Muscle Maximizer will do it all for you )
comments.author: Raymond Cooper

comments.text:
